{{Wired embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=BEFSR41 |revision=v2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C4510D |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29F040QC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=1 MiB |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC41C16256-35K |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8019AS |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:06:25 |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols= |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |802dot11_protocols= |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ch= |oui= }} ''EtherFast Cable/DSL Router with 4-Port Switch''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=BEFSR41}} The CPU used in this device appears to be a '''Samsung''' S3C4510D01-QERO. {{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_BEFSR41_2.0}}
[http://web.archive.org/web/20120904135614/http://www.ljmsite.com/tech/Linksys_BEFSR41 ''Linksys BEFSR41 ver 2 internals'' on '''lbmsite.com''' (.. now via archive.org)] :"MADE IN TAIWAN R.O.C." and "F"???"10407-00 REV:" is silkscreened on the board. The manuf. of this board would seem to be the same as the v1's main board.
